name: Machamp
specialText: Increase the Pokemon's Attack when the Pokemon is afflicted by a status condition.
basicAttack: Every third basic attack is a boosted attack that deals increased damage when it lands successfully.

skills.name: Karate Chop
skills.effect: Attacks opposing Pokemon with a sharp chop.

skills.name: Close Combat
skills.effect: Unleashes a series of punches in the designated direction, dealing increased damage with the last punch. The user can move while using this move and becomes immune to hindrances.
skills.upgrades: Deals increased damage to Pokemon that are affected by a status condition.

skills.name: Cross Chop
skills.effect: Has the user deliver a double chop with forearms crossed while dashing forward. This also increases the user's critical-hit rate.
skills.upgrades: Increases Attack with each basic attack, up to a set max.

skills.name: Bulk Up
skills.effect: After using this move, the user becomes immune to hindrances for a short time, their movement speed and Attack are increased, and their basic attack speed is increased. The user's next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.

skills.name: Dynamic Punch
skills.effect: Has the user jump to the designated location, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect nd leaving them unable to act when it hits. After using this move, the user becomes immune to hindrances for a short time, their movement speed is increased, and their basic attack speed is increased. The user's next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.
skills.upgrades: Futher increases Attack and movement speed.

skills.name: Submission
skills.effect: Releases Machampâ€™s power, making it into a status immune state and increases movement speed. The next normal attack deals additional damage and hits the ground in the targeted direction, causing damage and immobilization. Afterwards, increase attack.
skills.upgrades: Futher increases critical-hit rate and increases basic attack speed.

skills.name: Barrage Blow
skills.effect: Machamp's Unite Move. Increases the user's movement speed, Attack, Defense, and Sp. Def for a short time. If used again, unleashes a combo attack, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and shoving them (knockback). The final blow deals an especially large amount of damage. Similar to Machamp's Burst Attack in Pokken Tournament.

changeLogs.changes: Added Passive Skill name and effect. Updated Moves section.
Added hyperlinks to each moves to for players to get a preview of the move's animation.
Added Mugshot and Model. Added Viability Stats. Updated Character Sheet arrangement.
Updated Role Name to reflect changes from 2021 Mar Canada Regional Beta Test.
Updated Difficulty Name, Move Names, Category, Evolution Level, and Move Descriptions, updated Ability description, and added Basic Attack to reflect changes from 2021 Mar Canada Regional Beta Test.
